title: Pathe's animated gazette. No. 346
brief_description: This film is made up of the following items: leading Paris fashions; Trafalgar day march; Corporal Bassett, the first New Zealander to win the VC; the destroyed town of Mount St. Eloy; Sir Very Strong visits Bethnal Green military hospital; training recruits in mining and bombing attacks; ammunitions factories; inspection of French artillery; exhibition of German weapons.
